it.unibo.ai.didattica.competition.tablut.domain

Class GameAshtonTablut

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.ai.didattica.competition.tablut.domain.GameAshtonTablut
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    aima.core.search.adversarial.Game<State,Action,State.Turn>, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GameAshtonTablut
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game, java.lang.Cloneable, aima.core.search.adversarial.Game<State,Action,State.Turn>
    Game engine inspired by the Ashton Rules of Tablut

    • Method Detail

      • checkMove

        public State checkMove(State state,
                       Action action)
                throws BoardException,
                       ActionException,
                       StopException,
                       PawnException,
                       DiagonalException,
                       ClimbingException,
                       ThroneException,
                       OccupiedException,
                       ClimbingCitadelException,
                       CitadelException
        Method to check wheter an action is allowed or not for a given state. If it is not, throws and Exception.
        Parameters:
        state - Current state of the game
        action - The action to be checked
        Returns:
        the resulting State obtained by performing the given
        Throws:
        BoardException - if the action causes a pawn to leave the board
        ActionException - if the action format is wrong
        StopException - if no action is made
        PawnException - if a player is trying to move an opponent's pawn
        DiagonalException - if a player is trying to move a pawn diagonally
        ClimbingException - if a player is trying to make an action that would climb another pawn or special box illegally
        ThroneException - if a player is trying to move a pawn to the throne
        OccupiedException - if a player is trying to move a pawn onto a box that is already occupied
        ClimbingCitadelException - if a player is trying to make an action that would climb the citadel
        CitadelException - if a player is trying to move a pawn onto the citadel
